mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM PO_INTERFACE_ERRORS PIE, RCV_TRANSACTIONS_INTERFACE RT, RCV_HEADERS_INTERFACE RHI WHERE PIE.INTERFACE_TYPE = 'RCV-856' AND PIE.INTERFACE_LINE_ID = RT.INTERFACE_TRANSACTION_ID AND RT.HEADER_INTERFACE_ID = RHI.HEADER_INTERFACE_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM MTL_TRANSACTIONS_INTERFACE WHERE ERROR_EXPLANATION IS NOT NULL

SELECT IDWRM.YEAR, IDWRM.MONTH, IDWRM.CHASU, IDWRM.CONTENTS, ICUI.NAME, ICUI.ERP_LEGACY_GUBUN, ICUI.BUSINESS_ROLE FROM ITSM_DLM_WEEK_RESULT_MGR IDWRM, ITSM_COM_USER_INFO ICUI WHERE IDWRM.YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND IDWRM.MONTH = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')) AND IDWRM.CHASU = CEIL((SYSDATE - TRUNC(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 'IW') + 1) / 7) AND IDWRM.CREATED_BY = ICUI.LOGIN_ID ORDER BY ICUI.ERP_LEGACY_GUBUN ASC, IDWRM.SEQ_ID ASC

SELECT IDGRI.SEQ_ID ,IDGRI.ICUI_SEQ_ID ,ICUI.LOGIN_ID ,ICUI.NAME AS USER_NAME ,TO_CHAR(IDGRI.REQ_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQ_DATE ,IDGRI.VAC_TYPE ,(SELECT MEDIUM_CODE_KOR_NAME FROM ITSM_COM_CODE_INFO_DETAIL ICCID WHERE ICCID.MEDIUM_TYPE = IDGRI.VAC_TYPE) AS VAC_TYPE_NAME ,TO_CHAR(IDGRI.VAC_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VAC_START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(IDGRI.VAC_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VAC_END_DATE ,IDGRI.VAC_REQ_DAY ,IDGRI.VAC_REQ_REASON ,IDGRI.STATUS ,(SELECT MEDIUM_CODE_KOR_NAME FROM ITSM_COM_CODE_INFO_DETAIL ICCID WHERE ICCID.MEDIUM_TYPE = IDGRI.STATUS) AS STATUS_NAME ,IDGRI.VAC_APPROVER ,TO_CHAR(IDGRI.VAC_APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS VAC_APPROVE_DATE FROM ITSM_DLM_GTM_REQ_INFO IDGRI, ITSM_COM_USER_INFO ICUI WHERE IDGRI.ICUI_SEQ_ID = ICUI.SEQ_ID --차주 데이터 AND TO_CHAR(IDGRI.VAC_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE,'월요일'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(IDGRI.VAC_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= TO_CHAR(NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE+5,'금요일'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') --승인 데이터 AND IDGRI.STATUS = 'S' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(ICUI.ORDER_NUM) , IDGRI.VAC_START_DATE
